Andhra Pradesh http://www.kv2nsbvizag.org/innerpage.php?pagename=contact|School's address |schooltype = K.V.Schools (Central Schools) |authority = Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India. |established = |schoolboard = Central |chairperson = Cmde. A K SHUKLA http://www.kv2nsbvizag.org/uploads/vmc.htm |founder = Kendriya Vidyalaya Sanghatan, |principal = Mr. NISHI KANT AGGARWAL |headmistress = Mrs. M. Venkata Lakshmi |staff = 59 + 12+ 10 http://www.kv2nsbvizag.org/innerpage.php?pagename=staff |students = 1400 (approx.) |fees = 1800 (girls); 2400 (boys; class 9 & 10); Fees varies gender- wise from class 11 onwards |age_range = 10 |language = English, Hindi |campus = Suburb |hours_in_day = 6hrs. 30mins. |slogan = Sanskrit: तत्वं पूषनपावृणु |song = Bharat Ka Svarnim Gaurav Kendriya Vidyalaya Layega |yearbook= Vidyalaya Patrika |newspaper = Times NIE |status = Open {Running} |homepage = }} Kendriya Vidyalaya No. 2, Nausena Baugh, Vizag is a Co-educational school run by the KV Sangathan. It is located in the Southern Part of the city of Visakhapatnam, on the foothill of the Dolphin's Nose, Nausenabaugh. The school has three well maintained computer labs. It is a CBSE affiliated school. This is one of the three Kendriya Vidyalayas and one Navy Children School in the Naval Campus. The other three being KV1, NSB; KV Malkapuram; NCS, NSB, Vizag. ==Building== The school has a fairly big campus with a rectangular building which is two-storeyed. School has a large grassless playground where all sport activities are held. The school is set up in a serene quiet ambiance and away from the city cacophony and traffic noises. A solid-floored quadrangle is in the middle of the rectangular structure. A stage in the middle divides the building into Primary and Secondary Sections. ===Labs=== The school has 3 computer labs. One lab is solely dedicated for the usage of primary section (classes from I to V). The other two being utilised by Junior (VI - IX) and Senior (X - XII) Secondary Sections. ==See also== * List of Kendriya Vidyalayas ==References== * This page is created by Khushwant Singh, a former student of this school. == External links == * Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan Category:Kendriya Vidyalayas Category:Universities and colleges in Visakhapatnam
title: Kendriya Vidyalaya No. 2, Vizag
